message: Let's be fair and split the money reasonably.  I propose a 60/40 split.
I think a 55/45 split is a good starting point. It's closer to even than your offer, and hopefully, we can reach an agreement.
Bob, let's stop wasting time.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and most efficient way to end this.  Agree now, and we both benefit.
